Introduction


Prerequesties

Node js

NPM (comes together with node js)


Angular CLI - command line argument to create and work with angular projects.

To install angular cli use below command

  1. #In windows
  2. npm install -g @angular/cli
  3. #In mac or linux
  4. sudo npm install -g @angular/cli


To Create a New Angular Project

Open CMD in the project folder and enter following command.

  1. ng new <project-name>
  2. #example
  3. ng new hello-wold


Don't use space between the words.


Useful extensions for angular in VS code

  1. Angular Language Service.
  2. Angular Essentials.


To Start an Angular Project

  1. npm start


The project runs on localhost:4200. It will automatically re render the webpage when saving the code.
